Opinion
Per Curiam,
Judgment affirmed.

casebody.head_matter:
Simmons, Appellant, v. Doll’s Garage, Inc.
Argued May 26, 1970.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
Allen II. Smith, for appellant.
Robert J. Stewart, with him Liverant, Senft and Oohen, for appellee.
October 9, 1970:
